content: this is a great design for a scarf as it looks great on both sides i like using reversible stitch patterns for scarves easy to knit - i used less than a 100g 300m ball of acrylic dk and 4mm needles you can knit this pattern with aran weight yarn if you prefer - your scarf will be a little wider of course a lovely gender neutral design - suitable for children teens or adults a matching hat and handwarmer mittens are also available **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
